about_the_game:
The Undisputables : Online Multiplayer is a competitive online multiplayer TPS shooter game with fantastic stylized and cute cartoon 3D graphics and captivating gameplay.
Choose your unique character and weapons from tons of different characters and weapons of different classes and styles (Assault, SMG, Sniper, Shotgun, Knife, Pistol, Grenades, LMG, Heavy Machine Guns, Grenade Launcher, Laser Pistol, Water Gun , Electric Gun, Lava Gun, Flame Thrower....) each one with special properties. Customize your own and unique fighting skills and jump into the action, enter the battle and engage in team online PvP combat against other players around the world on a variety of maps.
Play with or against your friends in both online or local team death match.
The controls are intuitive and super easy to master with sweet interface.
Regular content updates, including new characaters, weapons, bombs, skills and maps.
Stunning graphics, cute sound effects, epic war sfx and beautiful musics creates a fun comic cartoon atmosphere.
Our game supports a very advanced bot system, so if there are not enough real players online to join the match, the game will connect advanced bots that react exactly like real players to keep every match with exactly 5 vs 5 players, they will join the match. with custom names, they can choose custom classes with equipment, custom soldiers, they can run, shoot, aim, jump, dodge, hide, camp everything real players can do, so this game will never die Even though there are no online players overall, the game is still fun to play against extremely intelligent bots.
detailed_description:
Army Troop


About the Game

The Undisputables : Online Multiplayer is a competitive online multiplayer TPS shooter game with fantastic stylized and cute cartoon 3D graphics and captivating gameplay.
Choose your unique character and weapons from tons of different characters and weapons of different classes and styles (Assault, SMG, Sniper, Shotgun, Knife, Pistol, Grenades, LMG, Heavy Machine Guns, Grenade Launcher, Laser Pistol, Water Gun , Electric Gun, Lava Gun, Flame Thrower....) each one with special properties. Customize your own and unique fighting skills and jump into the action, enter the battle and engage in team online PvP combat against other players around the world on a variety of maps.
Play with or against your friends in both online or local team death match.
The controls are intuitive and super easy to master with sweet interface.
Regular content updates, including new characaters, weapons, bombs, skills and maps.
Stunning graphics, cute sound effects, epic war sfx and beautiful musics creates a fun comic cartoon atmosphere.
Our game supports a very advanced bot system, so if there are not enough real players online to join the match, the game will connect advanced bots that react exactly like real players to keep every match with exactly 5 vs 5 players, they will join the match. with custom names, they can choose custom classes with equipment, custom soldiers, they can run, shoot, aim, jump, dodge, hide, camp everything real players can do, so this game will never die Even though there are no online players overall, the game is still fun to play against extremely intelligent bots.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 200 Series or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable GPU, Intel Iris Pro 5200 or AMD/Nvidia equivalent for Mac
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 capable GPU, Intel HD Graphics 5100 / AMD Radeon 77XX / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
